name: Readable Column - musl libc
description:
Pulls-in the page body to a narrower column rather than spilling out horizontally to fill a wide window. Narrows paragraphs and so on to even narrower, roughly sub-twenty word columns which are known to be more efficient for the human eye to track.

!!! Does nothing else: layer other styles on top of this one to modify fonts and colours as desired. !!!
